resources.string:
Strategy 1:
 o buys if the change (last – close) is greater than 5% 
 o sells if stock price is 5% lower than previous close 
 o holds otherwise

Strategy 2: 
 o sells if the change (last – close) is greater than 5% 
 o buys if stock price is 5% lower than previous close 
 o holds otherwise

Strategy 3: 
 o buys if ticker symbol is 4 characters 
 o sells if the time is between 1:00pm and 3:22pm 
 o holds if the above are true
